definition[0]: a company or person that provides a service
example[1]: A widow, she is the sole provider  (=the only one) for her family.
definition[2]: an organization that provides goods or services
example[2]: a provider of engineering and design services
example[3]: hospitals, nursing homes and other health-care providers
definition[3]: an adult who supports their family with his or her income
example[5]: A widow, she is the sole provider (=the only one) for her family.
